label: Payslips from regional employer
description: Payslips from each regional employer for the period of specified work, showing employer name, ABN, pay period, gross pay, and work location.
what_it_proves: Primary evidence that specified work was performed for an eligible employer in a regional area during the required period.
common_gaps: Cash-in-hand work with no payslip — significant risk indicator
Work location cannot be verified as regional from payslip alone
format_notes: Electronic payslips accepted. Keep PDF copies. If paid by cash, obtain a statutory declaration and supplementary evidence.

label: Tax file number (TFN) statement or tax return
description: ATO tax statement, income tax return, or payment summary (PAYG) confirming income earned from regional employers during the specified work period.
what_it_proves: Independent corroboration of specified work income and employer relationship, cross-checking payslips.
common_gaps: Payments not declared to ATO — consistency risk between payslips and tax records
Multiple employers listed but work period dates overlap inconsistently
format_notes: Download from myGov/ATO portal if original records lost. PAYG summary or income statement acceptable.

label: Employer reference letter
description: Letter from regional employer on company letterhead confirming dates of employment, nature of work performed, ABN, and eligible postcode/location.
what_it_proves: Confirms details of specified work engagement including regional eligibility and work category.
common_gaps: Letter not on letterhead or missing ABN
Work category listed does not match eligible specified work categories
format_notes: Request letter while still employed or immediately on finishing. Retrospective letters may raise credibility questions without corroboration.

label: Bank statements showing minimum savings
description: Bank statements from the 3 months prior to application showing accessible savings meeting the minimum financial threshold (approximately AUD $5,000 — verify current figure).
what_it_proves: Demonstrates financial capacity to fund the initial period of the working holiday.
common_gaps: Savings balance fluctuates significantly — large deposits immediately before application may raise questions
Account is in a third party's name — funds must be in the applicant's name or clearly accessible
format_notes: 3 months of statements. Include account holder name and BSB/account number. International bank accounts accepted but may need currency conversion note.
